level.text: When sponsorship is extended by the Department, assistance shall be given by the Department in the following ways:
Issue permit for facilities for rehearsal and for public presentation of the program in the public schools or other facilities available to the Department;
Provide such custodial and supervisory services within its resources as may be agreed upon between the Department and the Organization presenting the program;
Contribute assistance by the Department staff in staging, lighting, decorations, and similar areas; and
Handle all financial procedures through the Operations Division of the Department.

To ensure full cooperation between the Organization and the Department, and to avoid misunderstandings, a representative of the Department shall attend the business meetings of the advisory board of the Organization.
Copies of the minutes of business meetings shall be filed with the Department.
